original_title: A Woman On The Internet (or, The Eternal Scream)
overview: A filmic response to Lynn Hershman Leesonâ€™s text, Romancing the Anti-body (1995), exploring the jarring juxtapositions of friction, toxicity, joy and liberation that trans people, queers and femmes experience when playing as their own custom character creations in video game spaces.
title: A Woman On The Internet (or, The Eternal Scream)
